widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Site Visitors Day over Day : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Site Visitors Day over Day - AWS

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Site Visitors Day over Day : Combined

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%/' AS 'Homepage', where pageUrl like '%/browse/plans' AS 'Deals Listing', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%login.jsp' AS 'Add to Cart',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%/checkout' AS 'Payment') WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' and appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Purchase Funnel Today : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%/' AS 'Homepage', where pageUrl like '%/browse/plans' AS 'Deals Listing', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%login.jsp' AS 'Add to Cart',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%/checkout' AS 'Payment') WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' and appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Purchase Funnel Today: AWS

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%/' AS 'Homepage', where pageUrl like '%/browse/plans' AS 'Deals Listing', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%login.jsp' AS 'Add to Cart',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%/checkout' AS 'Payment') WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' and (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Purchase Funnel Today : Combined

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT count(errorMessage) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 day ago FACET errorMessage
widgets.title: Error Breakdown : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT count(errorMessage) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 day ago FACET errorMessage
widgets.title: Error Breakdown - AWS

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT count(errorMessage) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 day ago FACET errorMessage
widgets.title: Error Breakdown : Combined

widgets.nrql: FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') SINCE 1 week ago
widgets.title: Homepage Availability

widgets.nrql: FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT 100 - percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as '%' SINCE 1 month ago facet location limit 5
widgets.title: One Month Downtime

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT uniqueCount(username) as 'Count' WHERE error IS NOT NULL and username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 day ago
widgets.title: Users Experiencing Errors : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT uniqueCount(username) as 'Count' WHERE error IS NOT NULL and username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 day ago
widgets.title: Users Experiencing Errors : AWS

widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT uniqueCount(username) as 'Count' WHERE error IS NOT NULL and username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Users Experiencing Errors : Combined

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal) As 'Revenue' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES
widgets.title: Revenue Day over Day : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal) As 'Revenue' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES
widgets.title: Revenue Day over Day : AWS

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal) As 'Revenue' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES
widgets.title: Revenue Day over Day : Combined

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Count' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 5 minute ago UNTIL 1 minute ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Current Users : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Count' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 5 minute ago UNTIL 1 minute ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Current Users : AWS

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Count' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 5 minute ago UNTIL 1 minute ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Current Users : Combined

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT histogram(duration,10) WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Page Duration Last day (sec) : On-Premises

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT histogram(duration,10) WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Page Duration Last Day (sec) : AWS

widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT histogram(duration,10) WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Page Duration Last Day (sec) : Combined
